## [camunda-platform-11.10.3](https://github.com/camunda/camunda-platform-helm/releases/tag/camunda-platform-11.10.3) (2025-11-07)

### Fixes

- Use joinPath helper to fix double slash issues in console configmap (#4562)
- Remove console secret since console is a public OIDC client (#4482)

<!-- generated by git-cliff -->

### Verification

For quick verification of the Helm chart integrity using [Cosign](https://docs.sigstore.dev/signing/quickstart/):

```shell
cosign verify-blob camunda-platform-11.10.3.tgz \
  --bundle "camunda-platform-11.10.3-cosign-bundle.json" \
  --certificate-identity-regex "https://github.com/camunda/camunda-platform-helm" \
  --certificate-oidc-issuer "https://token.actions.githubusercontent.com"
```

For detailed verification instructions, check the steps in the `camunda-platform-11.10.3-cosign-verify.sh` file.
